Elemental Table

Air

The Element air is also about multiple elements of itself like wind for example it is essential we have air because we must breathe to run and play and live. If you had the power of air you could make world winds but if you abuse the power the world could crumble.

Lightning

The Element lightning is the reason we have heat and houses we know this Element today by the name of electrisity. We get energy from lightning striking on metal rods, that powers a city? Lightning follows and strikes metal, so if there is a storm don't were any metal!

Fire

The Element fire is special because it gives us heat and can roast marshmellows yes we could not live without fire.

Water

The water Element is probably the most important because we need water to suvive and to keep us hydrated.

Ice

The Element ice is very dangerous in some situation like a river that is frozen and you fall through it the current will keep you drowning and it is verry cold.

Earth

The Element earth is what we are standing on so earth wouldn't be earth unless we have earth do you no what I mean? Earth is the base of this planet.

Life

The Element life is what we are and plants and wildlife is important because plants produce oxegen not carbon dioxide is poison to us.
